The world would be thrown into chaos as dinosaurs adapt to the modern environment and compete with humans for resources.
Scientists would have the opportunity to study the behavior and biology of these extinct creatures in their natural habitat.
The economy would be greatly impacted as people would need to adjust to working alongside dinosaurs and adapting to their presence in the workplace.
There would be a significant shift in the balance of power on Earth, as dinosaurs would have a unique set of strengths and abilities that could give them an advantage over humans.
The revival of dinosaurs could lead to a new era of technological advancement as humans would need to develop new ways to communicate and coexist with these creatures.
